Epics In Progress Section II
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress Section II
This section is exclusively for the continuing stories in the Gitan and the Ogyo, Shrine of Hope, Main-sub, Champion Rising, Secrets of the Past, The MDA, Open Wounds, and Dark Army series.
Only the authors of those series may post here, in order to complete their epics.
If you want to start a new series, please go to the most recent Epics In Progress section.
(Right now that would be Epics In Progress, Section III)
